name: AWS Transfer Service (sftprazorpaycom).txt - Document URL
description: This section provides a URL link to an AWS blog post that discusses using VPC-hosted endpoints in shared VPCs with the AWS Transfer Family service. The blog post likely explains how to securely transfer files between on-premises systems and AWS resources using the AWS Transfer Family service, while leveraging VPC-hosted endpoints in a shared VPC environment for enhanced security and network isolation.
use_cases: Securely transferring files between on-premises systems and AWS resources
